document_type.reason: Large header text at top-left of the document reads 'Invoice' (visual header). Matches schema enum 'invoice'.

invoice_number.reason: Right side of the pale blue 'Invoice Details' box contains the label 'Invoice # 12345' (label + proximity to details block).

invoice_date.reason: Within the 'Invoice Details' block the line 'Invoice date 08/01/2024' is present; normalized to ISO-8601.

due_date.reason: Within the 'Invoice Details' block the line 'Due date 08/31/2024' is present; normalized to ISO-8601.

terms.reason: The 'Invoice Details' block explicitly lists 'Terms Net 30' (label found in details area).

currency.reason: Monetary values throughout the document use the dollar sign ('$') next to amounts; inferred currency USD.

vendor.reason: Top-left header block lists company name and address lines; top-right nearby lists phone, email and website aligned with vendor area (visual grouping). Country not explicitly shown; inferred 'US' from state CA but left as explicit country in value null.

customer.reason: Left column of the pale blue box labeled 'Bill To' contains recipient name and address lines; mapped using header 'Bill To' and proximity to address block.

pay_to.reason: No explicit 'Pay To' or bank/account instructions visible in the document; payment details are not present in structured pay-to form.

line_items.reason: Items table under headers 'Product/Services | Qty/Hrs | Rate | Amount' shows two rows. Quantities and rates are taken from the Qty/Hrs and Rate columns; amounts from Amount column. Unit inferred as 'hrs' from the 'Qty/Hrs' header.

item_table_headers.reason: Top of the items area displays these column headers; normalized to canonical column names for clarity.

subtotal.reason: Right-side totals section contains line 'Subtotal $650.00' aligned with totals block; numeric parsed removing currency symbol.

discount.reason: Totals area shows line 'Discount -$65.00' indicating a negative adjustment; normalized to negative numeric value.

tax_rate.reason: Totals area label reads 'Tax 8.5%'; captured percent string and normalized to decimal rate 0.085.

tax_amount.reason: Right-side totals block shows 'Tax 8.5% $49.73' — tax amount taken from the numeric column and normalized.

total.reason: Prominent 'Total' line at the bottom of totals block displays '$634.73' (final amount due); normalized to numeric.

payment_instructions.reason: Document does not contain a freeform payment instructions block or bank details; only invoice details, items, and totals are present.

due_terms_note.reason: Short terms note 'Terms Net 30' is present in the 'Invoice Details' block; included here as a due/terms note (duplicate of core.terms for completeness).

logo_present.reason: The document contains a prominent stylized header 'Invoice' and a decorative triangular graphic in the top-right corner — indicates presence of header graphics/logo.

raw_text_blocks.reason: OCR-like extraction of visible text blocks and table lines from the document preserved for downstream parsing. Blocks reflect visual grouping (header, vendor, bill-to, invoice details, table rows, totals).

detected_language.reason: All visible text is in English (labels like 'Invoice', 'Bill To', 'Invoice date', etc.).
